thread.section_title: Fesal Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Fesal | fesal.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text:
I must admit that I was a bit reluctant to buy this expensive kitchen hood from Fesal via the internet but everything was just perfect.
The product arrived on the promised date in a very solid wooden box that was specifically made to fit around the hood, so it arrived in perfect condition.
After installation I can also confirm that it filters (recycles) the air incredibly well. I am very pleased with the Falmec Libra and with Fesal and would certainly recommend both.
